import React, { Component } from 'react' import Like from './common/like.jsx' import TableHeader from './common/tableHeader' class MoviesTable extends Component { columns = [ { path: 'title', label: 'Title' }, { path: 'genre.name', label: 'Genre' }, { path: 'numberInStock', label: 'Stock' }, { path: 'dailyRentalRate', label: 'Rate' }, {}, {}, ] render() { const { movies, onLike, onDelete } = this.props return ( {movies.map((movie) => ( ))}
{movie.title} {movie.genre.name} {movie.numberInStock} {movie.dailyRentalRate} onLike(movie)} liked={movie.liked}>
) } } export default MoviesTable
